pageSlug.title: Page URL Path (Slug)
pageSlug.description: The unique path for your page URL (e.g., 'my-fundraiser'). Use letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

tipType.description: The type of tip (percentage, custom, or none).

lineItems.title: Line Items
lineItems.description: Define specific line items for this page, like different ticket types or product variants.

headerImage.title: Header Image URL
headerImage.description: URL for a banner image at the top of the page.

pageDescription.title: Page Description (General)
pageDescription.description: General description shown on the payment page.

limitPayments.title: Limit Number of Payments
limitPayments.description: Enable to limit how many times this payment link can be used.

messageAfterLimit.title: Message After Limit
messageAfterLimit.description: Message displayed if payment limit is reached.

afterPaymentConfig.title: After Payment Configuration
afterPaymentConfig.description: Configure what happens after a successful payment.

afterPaymentBehavior.title: After Payment Behavior
afterPaymentBehavior.description: Choose what to show the user after they pay.

redirectUrl.title: Redirect URL
redirectUrl.description: The URL to redirect to. Use {CHECKOUT_SESSION_ID} for the session ID.

enableSessionPage.title: Enable Secure Session Page
enableSessionPage.description: Gives the customer a unique, verifiable link to a post-payment page (e.g., for tickets).

details.title: Additional Details (List of strings)
details.description: Enter each detail as a separate item.

amounts.title: Predefined Amounts (List of numbers)
amounts.description: Enter each amount as a separate item.

whyPoints.title: Why Donate Points (List of strings)
whyPoints.description: Enter each point as a separate item.

assetId.title: Link to Digital Asset
assetId.description: Select a previously uploaded asset from your library.

instructions.title: Access Instructions (Post-Payment)
instructions.description: e.g., 'Download link will be shown after successful payment.'

email.title: Email Template
email.name: Internal Name
email.triggerPageDesc: Which page should trigger this email?
email.triggerStatusDesc: Send this email when a session's status changes to this.
email.subject: Email Subject

lineItem.title: Line Item

id.title: Internal ID (Optional)
id.description: A unique internal identifier for this line item, for your own reference. Not required.

price.title: Stripe Price ID (Optional)
price.description: Use if this item corresponds to an existing Stripe Price.

lineItem.description: Represents one item in an order.

submitType.title: Submit Button Label
submitType.description: Label on the main call-to-action button.

customFields.title: Custom Checkout Fields
customFields.description: Define custom fields to collect additional information.

billingAddress.title: Collect Billing Address
billingAddress.description: 'required' always collects the address. 'auto' collects it when necessary.

allowedCountries.title: Allowed Shipping Countries (ISO codes)
allowedCountries.description: e.g., US, CA, GB. Leave empty for all.

phone.title: Require Phone Number
phone.description: Collect customer's phone number at checkout.

promoCodes.title: Allow Promotion Codes
promoCodes.description: Enable customers to use promotion codes.

taxId.title: Allow Business Tax ID Collection
taxId.description: Enable to collect tax IDs from business customers.

taxRates.title: Applicable Tax Rates
taxRates.description: Select which pre-configured tax rates apply.

shippingRates.title: Available Shipping Options
shippingRates.description: Select which pre-configured shipping rates are available.

autoTax.title: Enable Automatic Tax Collection
autoTax.description: Indicates if Stripe Tax should be used.

terms.title: Terms of Service Acceptance
terms.description: Choose if customers must accept terms of service.

termsUrl.title: Terms of Service URL (if required)
termsUrl.description: URL to your terms of service document.

savePayment.title: Save Payment Details for Future Use
savePayment.description: Attempt to save the customer's payment method.
